thread.title: Ben Carson Says Muslim President Would Have to #039;Subjugate#039; Beliefs
thread.title_full: Ben Carson Says Muslim President Would Have to #039;Subjugate#039; Beliefs

title: Ben Carson Says Muslim President Would Have to #039;Subjugate#039; Beliefs
text:
Get Business & Technology Alerts 
28 Sep 2015 04:48 AM EST 
Ben Carson marked his surge to within one percentage point of GOP frontrunner Donald Trump with a return to his controversial comments about whether a Muslim could become US President. The retired neurosurgeon told ABC that a Muslim President must ‘subjugate beliefs to our constitution’. Carson's struggle with the issue of religion has not damaged his poll numbers. An NBC poll released on Sunday showed him at 20% support - only one percentage point behind the long-time frontrunner for the GOP nomination, Donald Trump.
